Fayetteville.Botanical Garden of the Ozarks: The Botanical Garden of the Ozarks is a community-based non profit botanical garden in northeast Fayetteville, Arkansas, United States. The 40-acre site is located at the border between Fayetteville and Springdale on Arkansas Highway 265 (Crossover Road). The garden currently consists of 6 acres of display gardens and a newly planted (2012) 20-acre arboretum.
